charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) - Felon in Possession of a Firearm(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced to a custodial term of 45 months on each of counts one, two and three, each term to run concurrent; upon release to 3 years supervised release under the standard and additional conditions imposed by this court. Court recommends that the defendant participate in RDAP; Special Assessment fee: $300; Fine: Waived. Forfeiture: see minutes.
